subject: Re: Lavazza - website updates
preview: Hi,  It looks great.  Thank you,  Daniela.

full_threads.body:
Hi,

It looks great.

Thank you,

Daniela.

Hi Daniela,

Confirming I have updated the font color to white for the new banner as requested.

You can view the live change here:
https://www.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/

Let me know if you need any further adjustments.

Hi Allie,

Thank you for the update.

Could you please update the font colour to white? (for this new banner only).

Thank you,

Daniela.

Hi Daniela,

Thanks for sending those assets through.

I have updated the homepage banner with the new image, copy, and link as requested.

Implementation Details:
  • Image: We proceeded without the version containing the Big Wet logo. Since it is not scaling correctly on mobile devices.
  • Link: The "Learn More" button now directs to the Big Wet Lavazza page.

You can view the live changes here: https://www.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/

Let me know if you would like any further tweaks; I am happy to help.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Allie,

Please find attached the image for the homepage banner. Ideally, we want to use the one with the Big Wet logo, but if that image doesn't scale for mobile, we can use the one without it.

Banner copy (also in the brief doc)

Coffee that works for your team
Lavazza Blue capsule solutions are now distributed by Big Wet.
Find the right fit for your workplace
[LEARN MORE]
Link to: https://www.bigwet.com.au/lavazza/#coffee-machine

Let me know if you have any questions.

Daniela

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Hi,

Thank you for the update. Looking all good now.

I'll share the banner image as soon as it gets approved.

Thank you,

Daniela.

Hi Daniela,

Confirming I've removed the newsletter in internal pages

Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you, always happy to help

Hi Allie,

Thank you for the update.

It is all looking good. I've just spotted that the Newsletter form in the footer is still visible in some internal pages. See screenshot below:



Could you please double-check and ensure the form is removed from internal pages as well?

Thank you,

Dnaniela.

Hi Daniela,

Thanks for the confirmation.

Just letting you know we’ve completed the requested changes.

Feel free to send through the homepage banner whenever it’s ready, and we’ll add it in straight away.

If you have any questions or need anything else, just let me know.

Hi Allie,

Yes, please proceed.

I'll share the banner for the homepage asap.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Daniela.

Hi Daniela,

Thanks so much for sending this through and for outlining everything so clearly.

Here’s a quick update from our end:
  • The requested changes should take around 1-2 hours to complete.
  • For December, Lavazza has 2 support hours included. You’ve used 10 minutes so far, which means you still have 110 minutes remaining.
  • Any work beyond the included hours is billed at $147/hour, invoiced at the end of the month.
  • We’ll do our very best to complete everything before 19 December.

Please feel free to send the final homepage banner image whenever it’s ready, and we’ll add it in as soon as we receive it.

Let us know if you’d like us to proceed with the work, and we’ll get started right away.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

We need several updates on the Lavazza website to remove some pages and set up redirects from the unpublished pages.

I've shared the brief doc outlining the required work. Please note there is a new homepage banner to be added; the final image is still pending, and I'll provide it as soon as it's ready.

Could you please confirm:
- How long would it take to implement these changes
- Whether this is covered under the current Lavazza service pack or if additional costs apply
- If the work can be completed before 19 December

Please let me know if you need any additional information from our end to scope the work.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,

Daniela



--

Daniela Salcedo Guerrero
HubSpot Administrator (she/her)
